segment.source: Deploying DaRT 8.0 to Administrator Computers
segment.target: Deploying DaRT 8.0 to Administrator Computers

segment.source: Deploying DaRT 8.0 to Administrator Computers
segment.target: Deploying DaRT 8.0 to Administrator Computers

segment.source: Deploying DaRT 8.0 to Administrator Computers
segment.target: Deploying DaRT 8.0 to Administrator Computers

segment.source: Before you begin the deployment of Microsoft Diagnostics and Recovery Toolset (DaRT) 8.0, review the requirements for your environment.
segment.target: Before you begin the deployment of Microsoft Diagnostics and Recovery Toolset (DaRT) 8.0, review the requirements for your environment.

segment.source: This includes the hardware requirements for installing DaRT 8.0.
segment.target: This includes the hardware requirements for installing DaRT 8.0.

segment.source: For more information about DaRT hardware and software requirements, see DaRT 8.0 Supported Configurations.
segment.target: For more information about DaRT hardware and software requirements, see DaRT 8.0 Supported Configurations.

segment.source: The topics in this section can be used to help you deploy DaRT in your enterprise based on your environment and deployment strategy.
segment.target: The topics in this section can be used to help you deploy DaRT in your enterprise based on your environment and deployment strategy.

segment.source: Deploy DaRT 8.0
segment.target: Deploy DaRT 8.0

segment.source: You can use the Windows Installer file for DaRT to install DaRT on a computer that you will use to first create the DaRT recovery image and then troubleshoot and fix end-user computers.
segment.target: You can use the Windows Installer file for DaRT to install DaRT on a computer that you will use to first create the DaRT recovery image and then troubleshoot and fix end-user computers.

segment.source: Frequently, across an organization, you might install on the administrator computer only the DaRT functionality that you need to create a DaRT recovery image.
segment.target: Frequently, across an organization, you might install on the administrator computer only the DaRT functionality that you need to create a DaRT recovery image.

segment.source: Then, on a help desk administrator’s computer, you might install only the DaRT functionality that you must have to troubleshoot a problem computer, such as the DaRT Remote Connection Viewer and the Crash Analyzer.
segment.target: Then, on a help desk administrator’s computer, you might install only the DaRT functionality that you must have to troubleshoot a problem computer, such as the DaRT Remote Connection Viewer and the Crash Analyzer.

segment.source: In addition to manually running the Windows Installer file to install DaRT, you can also install DaRT at the command prompt to support enterprise software deployment systems such as System Center Configuration Manager 2012.
segment.target: In addition to manually running the Windows Installer file to install DaRT, you can also install DaRT at the command prompt to support enterprise software deployment systems such as System Center Configuration Manager 2012.

segment.source: How to Deploy DaRT 8.0
segment.target: How to Deploy DaRT 8.0

segment.source: Change, repair, or remove DaRT 8.0
segment.target: Change, repair, or remove DaRT 8.0

segment.source: You can change, repair, or remove the DaRT installation by double-clicking the DaRT installation file and then clicking the button that corresponds to the action that you want to perform or through the Windows Control Panel.
segment.target: You can change, repair, or remove the DaRT installation by double-clicking the DaRT installation file and then clicking the button that corresponds to the action that you want to perform or through the Windows Control Panel.

segment.source: How to Change, Repair, or Remove DaRT 8.0
segment.target: How to Change, Repair, or Remove DaRT 8.0

segment.source: How to get DaRT 8.0
segment.target: How to get DaRT 8.0

segment.source: To get the DaRT software, see How to Get MDOP.
segment.target: To get the DaRT software, see How to Get MDOP.
